title: Specialty Treatments | Lisbon Spa | Four Seasons Hotel Ritz
description: Choose from one of our specialty treatments at the Spa at Four Seasons Hotel Ritz Lisbon, including reflexology, lymphatic drainage and acupuncture.
cleaned_text: - Reflexology - This therapy works on pressure points on the feet that are said to correspond to different parts of the body, reducing tiredness and stress and improving relaxation and energy. - 60 Minutes - EUR 170 - Lymphatic drainage - This oil-free body massage stimulates and activates lymphatic circulation. - 60 - 80 Minutes - EUR 170 - 230 - Acupunture - Traditional Chinese Medicine, an ancient technique performed with needles insertion on specific energy points, based on balancing and healing body, mind and soul. - 90 - 120 Minutes - EUR 155 - 195 Note: Prices and treatments are subject to change without notice.
